com.safenetinc.luna.provider.cipher

Class LunaRSAOAEPEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.cipher.LunaRSAOAEPEncoder

  • public class LunaRSAOAEPEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class introduced to perform RSA OAEP encoding/decoding in software as part of HAPP-103. The implementation follows http://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-56Br1.pdf

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LunaRSAOAEPEncoder()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] decodeOAEP(byte[] encodedMessage, int encodedMessageOffset, int encodedMessageLength, int keySize, byte[] encodedParams)
      Decodes encodedMessage using RSA OAEP decoding and returns message.
      static byte[] encodeOAEP(byte[] message, int messageOffset, int messageLength, int keySizeBytes, byte[] encodedParams, byte[] seed)
      Encodes a message using RSA OAEP Padding.
      static java.security.MessageDigest getMessageDigestFromParams(byte[] encodedParams)
      Gets appropriate MessageDigest by reading the hashing algorithm by decoding the encodedParams that come from LunaParametersOAEP.engineGetEncoded()}.
      static byte[] getSourceDataFromParams(byte[] encodedParams)
      Gets encoded source data by decoding the encodedParams that come from LunaParametersOAEP.engineGetEncoded()}.

      Performs The Mask Generation Function (MGF) to create a mask using specified seed.

    • Method Detail

      • mgf

        public static byte[] mgf(byte[] seed,
         int seedOffset,
         int seedLength,
         int expectedLength,
         java.security.MessageDigest digest)
        Performs The Mask Generation Function (MGF) to create a mask using specified seed.
        Parameters:
        seed - The seed to use for the MGF
        seedOffset - The offset into the seed byte array
        seedLength - The length in bytes of the seed
        expectedLength - The expected length of the returned mask
        digest - The MessageDigest to use for the Hash function
        Returns:
        The mask

      • getMessageDigestFromParams

        public static java.security.MessageDigest getMessageDigestFromParams(byte[] encodedParams)
        Gets appropriate MessageDigest by reading the hashing algorithm by decoding the encodedParams that come from LunaParametersOAEP.engineGetEncoded()}.
        Parameters:
        encodedParams - the encodedParams to decode
        Returns:
        The MessageDigest

      • getSourceDataFromParams

        public static byte[] getSourceDataFromParams(byte[] encodedParams)
        Gets encoded source data by decoding the encodedParams that come from LunaParametersOAEP.engineGetEncoded()}.
        Parameters:
        encodedParams - the encodedParams to decode
        Returns:
        byte array of the source data

      • encodeOAEP

        public static byte[] encodeOAEP(byte[] message,
                int messageOffset,
                int messageLength,
                int keySizeBytes,
                byte[] encodedParams,
                byte[] seed)
        Encodes a message using RSA OAEP Padding.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to encode
        messageOffset - Offset index of the message byte array
        messageLength - The length of the message. Must be <= keySizeBytes - 2 * hLen - 2 where hLen is the length in bytes of hashes from the Hashing algorithm.
        keySizeBytes - The size in bytes of the the RSA key
        encodedParams - The encoded params that come from LunaParametersOAEP.engineGetEncoded()}
        seed - The seed to use for the algorithm. If null or the length of the seed doesn't match hLen, seed is generated.
        Returns:
        The RSA OAEP encoded message

      • decodeOAEP

        public static byte[] decodeOAEP(byte[] encodedMessage,
                int encodedMessageOffset,
                int encodedMessageLength,
                int keySize,
                byte[] encodedParams)
        Decodes encodedMessage using RSA OAEP decoding and returns message.
        Parameters:
        encodedMessage - the encodedMessage to decode
        encodedMessageOffset - the offset into the encodedMessage
        encodedMessageLength - the length of the encodedMessage
        keySize - the key size in bytes
        encodedParams - The encoded params that come from LunaParametersOAEP.engineGetEncoded()}
        Returns:
        the decoded message
